page.title: 06Aberystwyth Vehicle Survey
page.content:
A count was made of all the vehicles entering Aberystwyth from the three main roads: from North,South and East. The following was recorded:(a) type of vehicle,(b) country where cars were built,(c) colour of vehicle,(d) registration numbers. It was made on 28/6/85 for 15 mins. The results were: (a) { NORTH SOUTH EAST 159 137 170
(b) British:266 Swedish:26 Japanese: 38 Italian:17 German: 28 French: 25 Others: 1
(c){Red Blue Green White Black Yellow 115 111 36 71 16 24
{Silver Gold Orange Brown Others 36 10 10 43 10
